item.title: Using Wordpress as a Static Site
item.description: Many people prefer to use Wordpress over platforms such as Hugo, Ghost et al. many of these situations don’t need a blogging platform but instead choose Wordpress due to the array of plugins and ease of management, however this obviously have a overhead compared to a static site.
